subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jose Abreu was prescribed rest for his inflamed left ankle after a magnetic resonance imaging exam showed no structural damage, the first bit of positive news for the injury-riddled White Sox in quite some time.
snippet: Jose Abreu was prescribed rest for his inflamed left ankle after a magnetic resonance imaging exam showed no structural damage, the first bit of positive news for the injury-riddled White Sox in quite some time.
